Result.Abstract: This paper aimed to review, and assess the 'effectiveness' of the attempts undertaken to improve prospective and practising science teachers' conceptions of nature of science (NOS). Result.Title: Improving science teachers' conceptions of nature of science: a critical review of the literature

Result.Title: The nature of science and instructional practice: Making the unnatural natural

Result.Title: Teachers' understanding of the nature of science and classroom practice: Factors that facilitate or impede the relationship

Result.Title: Exploring Prospective Teachers' Worldviews and Conceptions of Nature of Science
